resources.string: Lloyd lives in a void.\n\nThe void has always been empty, but recently some strange things have been happening in his void...

Llyod has suddenly found himself by strange objects, which he has dubbed the evil Whatsamajigs.

In order to get his home back, he will have to defeat every Whatsamajig he comes across!

 Help Lloyd defeat the Whatsamajigs by shooting him into them, and making them all disappear.
Each Whatsamajig has a special color to start. This color indicates how tough the Whatsamajig is, and how many times Lloyd will have to hit it to make it disappear from the void.
These are the strongest Whatsamajigs, and take 3 hits.
These Whatsamajigs are medium strength, and take 2 hits.
These Whatsamajigs are puny! Just 1 hit and they disappear!
Whatsamajigs come in many, many different shapes, sizes, and types. Play with Lloyd and discover what each one does!
